ai-tha-ap466:1.2_0: walking in the presence of the Teacher,
ai-tha-ap466:1.4_0: I am the one to build a bridge
ai-tha-ap466:2.2_0: to build a bridge for you,
ai-tha-ap466:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap466:2.4_0: as a white cloth for the swept.
ai-tha-ap466:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap466:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Setavyā.
ai-tha-ap466:7.1_0: he took the fourth Elder Setaver’s son,
